desc: Daizys Wardrobe is an independent ladies fashion boutique serving locally from our shop in Alresford, Colchester, Essex and now we are online everywhere in the UK! Collections include Dresses, Shirts & Tops, Coats & Jackets, Bottoms, Loungewear & Accessories

layout.text: Daizy's Wardrobe is an independent ladies fashion boutique serving locally from our shop in Alresford, Colchester and now we are online everywhere in the UK!
